keyFacts: The document is an FBI Victim Notification Form for case number 72-MM-113327, dated December 8, 2009.
It identifies Bradley James Edwards as a victim, with a recorded victimization date of October 23, 2009.
Alfredo Rodriguez is listed as the subject ('SEE SUB Details') of the document, indicating his relevance to the case.
The form captures detailed personal information about the victim, including address, SSN, and contact details, standard for FBI victim documentation.
The case ID references (72B-MM-111327, 188B-MM-105207-C) suggest this is part of a larger investigative file, potentially linked to the Epstein case network.
